# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.math }}</div>

## Signature

```> math product ```


## Input/output types:

| input        | output |
| ------------ | ------ |

## Examples

Compute the product of a list of numbers
```nu
> [2 3 3 4] | math product
72
```
